Module sce.cz2002.cyhm.first
Package CZ2002_Assignment

Class Order

java.lang.Object
CZ2002_Assignment.Order
public class Order extends Object
Order Class: attributes and methods that is relevent to a customer's order

  • Constructor Summary

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAlacarte​(MenuItem dish, Integer qty)
    Adds a alacarte item to this order If alacarte item is already ordered, just add the quantity ordered to alacarteqty ArrayList Else, add the new alacarte item to alacarte ArrayList as a new element and also add the quantity to alacarteqty ArrayList as a new element Then total price of alacarte items added will be added to TotalPrice of this order
    void
    addAlacarteItems​(Menu m)
    Asks user to add new alacarte item(s) to order Menu for alacarte items will be printed and user will be asked to input which item and quantity of item they want to add.
    void
    addItems​(Menu m)
    Asks user to add items to their order User will be asked to add alacarte items or promotion.
    void
    addPromo​(Promotion promotion, Integer qty)
    Adds a promotion to this order If promotion is already ordered, just add the quantity ordered to promoqty ArrayList Else, add the new promotion to promo ArrayList as a new element and also add the quantity to promoqty ArrayList as a new element Then total price of promotions added will be added to TotalPrice of this order
    void
    addPromoItems​(Menu m)
    Asks user to add new promotion(s) to order Menu for promotions will be printed and user will be asked to input which promotion and quantity of promotion they want to add.
    void
    createOrder​(Menu menu)
    Creates a new instance of order User will be asked to input table number and discount if any.
    float

    Gets the discount of order if customer is a member

    Gets the name of the staff that is assigned to the order

    Gets the total price of the order after discount is applied
    double
    getTotalPriceAfterTax()
    Gets the total price of the order after tax is applied
    void
    printInvoice()
    Prints out the invoice of this order, whcih includes table number, all items ordered and total price of order after discount and taxes are applied.
    void
    printOrder()
    Prints out all the items ordered, which includes the staff assigned, table number, time stamp, discount applied and total price of order
    void
    printOrderItems()
    Prints out the full list of items that have been ordered
    void
    printOrderItemsWoList()
    Prints out the full list of items that have been ordered without the print statements
    void
    removeAlacarte​(MenuItem dish, Integer qty)
    Removes an alacarte item that has been ordered This will first subtract the quantity to be removed from the alacarteqty ArrayList If resulting quanitity is 0, then the alacarte item itself will be removed from alacarte ArrayList Then total price of alacarte items removed will be subtracted from TotalPrice of this order
    void
    removeAlacarteItems()
    Asks user to remove alacarte item(s) that has been ordered User will be asked to input which alacarte item and quantity of alacarte item they want to remove.
    void
    removeItems()
    Asks user to remove items from their current order User will be asked to remove alacarte items or promotion.
    void
    removePromo​(Promotion promotion, Integer qty)
    Removes a promotion that has been ordered This will first subtract the quantity to be removed from the promoqty ArrayList If resulting quanitity is 0, then the promotion itself will be removed from promo ArrayList Then total price of promotions removed will be subtracted from TotalPrice of this order
    void
    removePromoItems()
    Asks user to remove promotion(s) that has been ordered User will be asked to input which promotion and quantity of promotion they want to remove.
    void

    Sets the discount applied to this order

    updateOrder​(Menu menu)
    Asks user to update thier current Prints out the full menu and user will be asked to add or remove items Calls either addItems() or addItems().

  • Constructor Details

    • Order

      public Order​(Staff s, LocalTime ts, int tn, float d)
      Default constructor for Order
      Parameters:
      s - staff object who is taking the order
      ts - timestamp of the order
      tn - table number of the order
      d - discount of the order

  • Method Details

    • createOrder

      public void createOrder​(Menu menu)
      Creates a new instance of order User will be asked to input table number and discount if any. Then calls addItems() which asks user to order items.
      Parameters:
      menu - , a list of all menuitems available

    • updateOrder

      public void updateOrder​(Menu menu)
      Asks user to update thier current Prints out the full menu and user will be asked to add or remove items Calls either addItems() or addItems().
      Parameters:
      menu - of all items available

    • addItems

      public void addItems​(Menu m)
      Asks user to add items to their order User will be asked to add alacarte items or promotion. Calls either addPromoItems() or addAlacarteItems().
      Parameters:
      m - menu object from the SystemManger

    • removeItems

      public void removeItems()
      Asks user to remove items from their current order User will be asked to remove alacarte items or promotion. Calls either removePromoItems() or removeAlacarteItems().

    • addAlacarteItems

      public void addAlacarteItems​(Menu m)
      Asks user to add new alacarte item(s) to order Menu for alacarte items will be printed and user will be asked to input which item and quantity of item they want to add. Calls the addAlacarte() function to add each item to order User will be in a loop that allows them to keep adding unitl they input -1 to stop.
      Parameters:
      m - menu object from the SystemManger

    • removeAlacarteItems

      public void removeAlacarteItems()
      Asks user to remove alacarte item(s) that has been ordered User will be asked to input which alacarte item and quantity of alacarte item they want to remove. Calls the removeAlaCarte() function to remove each item from order User will be in a loop that allows them to keep removing unitl they input -1 to stop.

    • addPromoItems

      public void addPromoItems​(Menu m)
      Asks user to add new promotion(s) to order Menu for promotions will be printed and user will be asked to input which promotion and quantity of promotion they want to add. Calls the addPromo() function to add each item to order User will be in a loop that allows them to keep adding unitl they input -1 to stop.
      Parameters:
      m - menu object from the SystemManger

    • removePromoItems

      public void removePromoItems()
      Asks user to remove promotion(s) that has been ordered User will be asked to input which promotion and quantity of promotion they want to remove. Calls the removePromo() function to remove each item from order User will be in a loop that allows them to keep removing unitl they input -1 to stop.

    • addAlacarte

      public void addAlacarte​(MenuItem dish, Integer qty)
      Adds a alacarte item to this order If alacarte item is already ordered, just add the quantity ordered to alacarteqty ArrayList Else, add the new alacarte item to alacarte ArrayList as a new element and also add the quantity to alacarteqty ArrayList as a new element Then total price of alacarte items added will be added to TotalPrice of this order
      Parameters:
      dish - of alacarte item to be added
      qty - of alacarte item to be added

    • removeAlacarte

      public void removeAlacarte​(MenuItem dish, Integer qty)
      Removes an alacarte item that has been ordered This will first subtract the quantity to be removed from the alacarteqty ArrayList If resulting quanitity is 0, then the alacarte item itself will be removed from alacarte ArrayList Then total price of alacarte items removed will be subtracted from TotalPrice of this order
      Parameters:
      dish - of alacarte item to be removed
      qty - of alacarte item to be removed

    • addPromo

      public void addPromo​(Promotion promotion, Integer qty)
      Adds a promotion to this order If promotion is already ordered, just add the quantity ordered to promoqty ArrayList Else, add the new promotion to promo ArrayList as a new element and also add the quantity to promoqty ArrayList as a new element Then total price of promotions added will be added to TotalPrice of this order
      Parameters:
      promotion - of promotion to be added
      qty - of promotion to be added

    • removePromo

      public void removePromo​(Promotion promotion, Integer qty)
      Removes a promotion that has been ordered This will first subtract the quantity to be removed from the promoqty ArrayList If resulting quanitity is 0, then the promotion itself will be removed from promo ArrayList Then total price of promotions removed will be subtracted from TotalPrice of this order
      Parameters:
      promotion - of promotion to be removed
      qty - of promotion to be removed

      public void setStaffName​(Staff s)
      Sets the name of the staff assigned to this order
      Parameters:
      s - of staff to add

      Returns:

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • getDiscount

      public float getDiscount()
      Gets the discount of order if customer is a member
      Returns:
      discount of order

    • setTax

      public void setTax​(float tax)
      Sets the taxes applied to this order ie. GST and/or service charge
      Parameters:
      tax - float of tax

    • getTax

      public float getTax()
      Gets the tax applied to the order ie. GST and/or serivice charge
      Returns:
      tax applied

    • getTotalPrice

      public double getTotalPrice()
      Gets the total price of the order
      Returns:
      total price of order

    • getTotalPriceAfterCalculation

      public double getTotalPriceAfterCalculation()
      Gets the total price of the order after discount is applied
      Returns:
      total price after discount

      public double getTotalPriceAfterTax()
      Gets the total price of the order after tax is applied
      Returns:
      total price after taxes

    • printOrderItems

      public void printOrderItems()
      Prints out the full list of items that have been ordered

    • printOrderItemsWoList

      public void printOrderItemsWoList()
      Prints out the full list of items that have been ordered without the print statements

    • printOrder

      public void printOrder()
      Prints out all the items ordered, which includes the staff assigned, table number, time stamp, discount applied and total price of order

    • printInvoice

      public void printInvoice()
      Prints out the invoice of this order, whcih includes table number, all items ordered and total price of order after discount and taxes are applied.
